reviewtext: Not much to say except it is so easy to setup. Make sure you unplug all your devices including the Cable/DSL modem to insure you get a fresh IP. The complaints from other users are meant only for hard core users who wish to run servers, they have more advanced routers for their needs. Yet if you are a home user who just wants to share a cable/DSL line with 2 or more PC's, you can't beat this low cost router.
summary: So simple a child could install it
